name: Tuna & Archie Carnival Adventure
description:
A 2D Solo/ Co-op Top Down Shoot Em' Up where the player(s) play as either a cat named Tuna or a dog named Archie that was separated from their owner, Ashley and accidentally travelled to a distant futuristic carnival filled where cyborg squirrels rule the world. Player(s) now armed with items from carnivals in the past, must fight their way through the futuristic squirrel-filled carnival and find their way back home to their owner, Ashley back in the present.
